channel.title: Comments on: Explosive antics in the field

item.title: By: Rome is actually a great place to see. Rome Hotels
item.dc:creator: Rome is actually a great place to see. Rome Hotels
item.description: Hey there! I know this is somewhat off topic but I was wondering if you knew where I could get a captcha plugin for my comment form? I'm using the same blog platform as yours and I'm having trouble finding one? Thanks a lot!
item.content:encoded:
Hey there! I know this is somewhat off topic but I was wondering if you knew where I could get a
captcha plugin for my comment form? I’m using the same blog platform as yours and I’m having trouble finding one?
Thanks a lot!

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: I'm liking it. Especially your blog title.
item.content:encoded: I’m liking it. Especially your blog title.

item.title: By: The Week in Science (Feb 4-10) | Science Communication Blog Network
item.dc:creator: The Week in Science (Feb 4-10) | Science Communication Blog Network

item.title: By: Alex Brown
item.dc:creator: Alex Brown
item.description: Thanks for taking us on this adventure, Sara. I do sometimes miss fieldwork, though I've never been anywhere as exciting as a helicopter over a volcano!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for taking us on this adventure, Sara. I do sometimes miss fieldwork, though I’ve never been anywhere as exciting as a helicopter over a volcano!
